title: Olaf should get a buff
body: I think olaf is very lacking atm, even a little buff like his active on his ult making him fully immune to all stuns/knockups/whatnot, tbh i thought it was that untill riven kept knocking me up in ult, in my opinion it woudl make him more viable, but thats just my 2 cents on the matter

replies.body: He is... if the Riven was knocking you up while you were in Ult, then thats a bug.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=GNYE6Qu6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-21T08:40:16.336+0000)
>
> He is... if the Riven was knocking you up while you were in Ult, then thats a bug.

It's been a big bug since he's been released
quote almost every leauge player ever "bugs dont exist"

Olaf doesn't need a buff in the current meta he is a top teir jungler at the moment with the current cinderhulk, if a olaf gets ahead he is going to be really annoying.

As for olaf top he fell out of meta when gnar, rumble and kennen started to show up because they can just poke him out of lane then outscale him.

Have you even been watching worlds? Olaf is very dominant there and deserves anything but a buff. His ult doesn't "cleanse" knockups, but it does prevent them from occurring in the first place. Just ult before riven knocks u up and you should be fine
